infobox.Japanese title:: スーパーカーの罠  (Suupaa Kaa no Wana)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Sango Yokomizo  Policeman  Policeman  Doctor
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa, Next Conan's Hint (Part 1)  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri, Next Conan's Hint (Part 1)  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Akio Otsuka as Sango Yokomizo, Next Conan's Hint (Part 2)  Ken Shiroyama as Daigo Teraizumi  Katsumi Chou as Zenkichi Kuroiwa  Koji Yusa as Hisashi Suguro  Yoshizou Yamaguchi as Kazuo Noda  Nobuo Shimazaki as Ichiro Otake  Hikaru Hanada as Shinsuke Sagara  Tetsuo Kanao as Jouji Kameoka  Takayuki Inoue as Boy (Episode 197)  Isshin Chiba as Doctor (Episode 198)  Takashi Nagasako as Forensics officer (Episode 198)

sections.Situation: Kogoro, Ran, and Conan attend a car show in Izuku Oogen, Shizuoka Prefecture, and Kogoro is hired to find out who sent a threatening message. Teraizumi is later found dead in his car with full of fume.
sections.People:
- 28 years old

sections.Trivia:
- The five classic supercars in the museum are a 1967 Toyota 2000GT [MF10], a 1953 Jaguar XK 120 Roadster, a 1955 Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Coupe 'Gullwing' [W198], a 1953 Cadillac Eldorado Convertible [6267S], and a 1966 Ferrari Dino 206 GT.
- Sango Yokomizo claimed that he never caught a cold before.
